txt.en: 'Can you smell it? Apple-barrels on the piers again today.'
'Hear about the old master? Reeks like rotten fish, it does!'
'They say the Dark Lord has fallen. Could it be true?'
'Dragons, war, hardship... we have weathered them all.'
'What shall I buy in the market today?'
'Have you heard? The Elves marched on Dol Guldur.'
'King Bard fell before the gates of Erebor.'
'We defeated the Jangovar. Why are they still in our land?'
'King Bard is so young, poor lad! It is good his mother guides him.'
'I shall never tire of looking up and seeing Erebor above us.'
'Up-river, down-lake, I am happier on a boat than land!'
